name: Coil, coating, m2, at plant
description: The coil coating process includes all known cradle-to-gate processes necessary for the treatment of metallic sheets. The process however omits the production of the metal coils themselves as the feedstock metal can vary depending on the product.  Raw materials include all known pre-treatments, cleaners, paints, and packaging materials to protect the finished sheets--as well as inbound transport.  Manufacturing processes require electricity, heat from natural gas, and process water.  Air and water emissions are captured in the output of the process.

category.name: 3328: Coating, Engraving, Heat Treating, and Allied Activities

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Metal coil coating process necessary for metallic construction products. Technology based on companies identified by Metal Construction Association to be representative of industry.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

flow.name: Coil, coating, m2, at plant
categoryPath: 3328: Coating, Engraving, Heat Treating, and Allied Activities

exchanges.description: m3 amount LPG replaces "CUTOFF Thermal energy from propane (MJ)" using HHV 49.1 MJ/kg for LPG and density 543.478 kg/m3 (per USLCI petroleum refining products densities)
